document.full_text: fashion-conscious maria sharapova produced another dazzling performance in her beloved paris to reach the french open semi-finals with a crushing 6-0 6-3 win over german andrea petkovic on wednesday.
document.title: dazzling sharapova surges into paris semi-finals
lines_and_colors: fashion-conscious maria sharapova produced another dazzling performance in her beloved paris to reach the french open semi-finals with a crushing 6-0 6-3 win over german andrea petkovic on wednesday.
